item.title: Comment on The Daylight Computer by bob
item.description:
Reply to Kevin:

It's a good sign when your two main complaints are 1. it's too expensive and 2. why do they keep selling out.

Only if the reason you're selling out is that you can't meet demand, as opposed to that you're trying a gimmicky strategy of not meeting demand, so that the simple rubes who need to feel like they're part of an exclusive club are happy.
